column1: The Purple Pig////Pigs Ear with crispy kale
column2: pickled cherry peppers & fried egg - the most yummy thing we got. Break the egg
column3: mix in the oozing runny yolk
column4: then the softness of the egg blends perfectly with the crispyness of kale and pigs ear. The salty ear and the pickled peppers also compliment each other.
